thread.title_full: Event of the Day for Oct. 18, 2015: Central City Opera at Picketwire

title: Event of the Day for Oct. 18, 2015: Central City Opera at Picketwire
text: Event of the Day for Oct. 18, 2015: Central City Opera at Picketwire Comment   Writer Posted Oct. 18, 2015 at 6:00 AM Posted Oct. 18, 2015 at 6:00 AM Picketwire Center for Performing and Visual Arts will host the Central City Opera Sunday at 2 p.m. featuring their staged variety show Smooth Operator, which includes scenes from operas and musical theater. Tickets are $15.   Writer
